snake.title: Snake Benchmark
snake.description: Compare AI model implementations of the classic Snake game. Test LLM coding capabilities through interactive gameplay.
snake.keywords: Snake game, AI coding, LLM benchmark, game implementation, code generation test

controls.description: Avoid hitting walls or the snake's own body
Eat food to grow longer and score points

requirements.title: Stable Game Loop
requirements.description: Frame rate control to ensure consistent speed across different devices.

requirements.title: Collision Detection
requirements.description: Handle interactions between snake head, food, walls, and snake body.

models.name: DEEPSEEK V3.2
models.notes: Excellent consistency in UI and smooth gameplay performance.

models.name: SONNET 4.5
models.notes: Smooth movements, simple and beautiful UI, also able to increase difficulty‚Äîvery good.

models.name: GPT 5.2
models.notes: UI design is simple and the task is completed, but there are some issues with game logic, especially with right wall collision detection.

models.name: KIMI K2
models.notes: Smooth movements, basically completes the task, but UI layout and right wall collision detection have issues.

models.name: QWEN3 MAX
models.notes: Still failed after three attempts at fixing.

tetris.title: Tetris Benchmark
tetris.description: Evaluate AI model performance in creating a full-featured Tetris game. Test complex logic handling, including piece rotation, line clearing, and increasing difficulty.
tetris.keywords: Tetris game, AI coding, LLM benchmark, game logic, piece rotation, line clearing

controls.description: Arrow keys to move and rotate
Rotate pieces to fit them into horizontal lines
Clear lines to score points and prevent the stack from reaching the top

requirements.title: Rotation Logic
requirements.description: Handle piece orientation changes and wall-kick collisions.

requirements.title: Line Clearing
requirements.description: Detect full horizontal rows, remove them, and shift the stack down.

requirements.title: Difficulty Scaling
requirements.description: Increasing drop speed as the score or level increases.

models.name: DEEPSEEK V3.2
models.notes: Accurate & beauitiful task completion and extra features like space bar for quick drop and next piece preview.

models.name: GPT 5.2
models.notes: Complete the task, and add features like falling preview and space bar for quick drop.

models.name: GEMINI 3 PRO
models.notes: Complete the task, and the page is also beautiful.

models.name: SONNET 4.5
models.notes: Accurate & perfect task completion, smooth movements, beautiful UI.

models.name: GLM 4.7
models.notes: Complete the task, but the prediction of the falling block failed.

models.name: KIMI K2
models.notes: Complete the task, but the animation is not smooth.

models.name: GROK CODE FAST V1
models.notes: Complete the task, but there is a blank column on the right side of the page.

models.name: QWEN3 MAX
models.notes: First generation failed, but successfully completed the task after three attempts at fixing.
